text: Michal Schmuck (9 January 1909 – 11 June 1980) was a Czechoslovak/Slovak water polo player who competed at the 1928 Summer Olympics. Schmuck was born in Pressburg/Pozsony, Austria-Hungary (today Bratislava, Slovakia). In 1928 he was part of the Czechoslovak team in the Olympic tournament. He played the only match. He died in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia in 1980. ==References== *sports-reference Category:1909 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Czechoslovak male water polo players Category:Slovak male water polo players Category:Water polo players at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic water polo players of Czechoslovakia Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Michal Schmuck
